Html:
Hi,

I am trying to start up on PRISM and am having an issue on setting up projects. I would like to develop an application having at least 3 modules and don't where to start since the quickstarts focus on a particular part of PRISM. Are the there templates that will make the development easy and which project types fit what MVVM parts.

 

Kindly assist. I could not find a good getting started guide on this.

Hi,

Currently, there are no Visual Studio templates for building Prism 4.0 applications. You can read more about this in this thread.

You might find the MVVM Reference Implementation useful, as it portrays a complete MVVM scenario in a composite application. You might also find the Prism Training kit, as well as this MVVM training asset by Karl Shifflett (link) useful to know where to start from.

I hope you find this information useful.

Thanks,

Miguel Bronzovic
http://blogs.southworks.net/mbronzovic
